hero.description: I’m not going to stop the wheel. I’m going to break the wheel.

whoami.title: Who Am I ?
whoami.intro: Hello! My name is Jasur Xaitov — but friends just call me Jasur.
whoami.description1: I'm a 20-year-old frontend developer deeply passionate about the JavaScript ecosystem. Currently, I work as a Frontend Developer at Tilmoch.ai, and I’m also pursuing my studies at INHA University in Tashkent.
whoami.description2: I was born in Surkhandaryo, Denov region, and from a young age, I’ve always been curious about technology.
whoami.description3: At the age of 17, I made a life-changing decision — one that I’ll always be proud of: I chose to become a programmer.
whoami.description4: Since then, I’ve been building, learning, and growing in the world of web development.
whoami.description5: Outside of tech, I enjoy watching UFC fights and playing football — they help me recharge and stay balanced.
whoami.closing: Oh, and one more thing... I'm not a fan of marketing or branding myself — so I’ll keep this short
